Test Data 
=========

All test data is stored in the repository, specifically under the path: ``test/data``.

Available Test Data
-------------------

Below is the list of test data available:

* **Pose Files**:
  
  - ``mediapipe.pose``
  - ``mediapipe_hand_normalized.pose``
  - ``mediapipe_long.pose``
  - ``mediapipe_long_hand_normalized.pose``
  - ``openpose.pose``

* **Image Files**:

  - ``optical_flow.png``
